rooms.description: Modern open-plan living area with sliding glass walls and minimalistic design.
Adjacent to the kitchen, featuring modern decor and ambient lighting.
Fully equipped modern kitchen with island counter; Vastu compliant layout ensuring positive energy flow.
Dedicated workspace with ample natural light and soundproofing for a quiet environment.
Guest bedroom located near the entrance with easy access to common areas.

openings.description: Main entrance with Vastu oriented towards north-west to attract positive energy.
Large window ensuring natural light and ventilation.
Door connecting living area to dining room.

additional_features.description: Modern swimming pool designed in the south-east corner of the plot with Vastu considerations for water element balance.
Open patio space that connects the living room and pool area.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with private balcony and walk-in closet; Vastu compliant with direction north.
Secondary bedroom with ample storage and natural lighting.
Additional bedroom ensuring comfort for extended family or guests.
Compact bedroom designed with modern aesthetics and minimalistic furnishings.

openings.description: Balcony window ensuring cross-ventilation and scenic views.
Staircase access door connecting upper and ground floors.

additional_features.description: Balcony adjoining master bedroom for private outdoor space.

notes: This floor plan design is a modern split-level 6BHK townhouse tailored for a 40x60 feet plot with an integrated swimming pool, designed with Indian residential norms and Vastu principles in mind.
